edu.uoc.som.jarvis.plugins.slack

Interface SlackUtils

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ChatUtils

    public interface SlackUtils
extends ChatUtils
    An utility interface that holds Slack-related helpers.

    This class defines the jarvis configuration key to store the Slack bot API token, as well as a set of API response types that are used internally to check connection and filter incoming events.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String HELLO_TYPE
      The Slack API answer type representing a successful authentication.
      static String MESSAGE_TYPE
      The Slack API answer type representing a message.
      static String SLACK_CONTEXT_KEY
      The RuntimeContexts key used to store slack-related information.
      static String SLACK_TOKEN_KEY
      The Configuration key to store the Slack bot API token.

      • Fields inherited from interface edu.uoc.som.jarvis.plugins.chat.ChatUtils

        CHAT_CHANNEL_CONTEXT_KEY, CHAT_CONTEXT_KEY, CHAT_USERNAME_CONTEXT_KEY
